content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL with 48 units of iron ore loaded.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates; holds fuel {'coal': 2}, has produced 6 copper plates, energy 1600.0, and status: NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing research "automation" with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 10}; status: NO_POWER and electrical_id updated to 12872.
- ElectricityGroup with id=12872 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); warnings include “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, and “no fluid present in connections”; status: NOT_CONNECTED.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding ~199.97 units of water at 15°C; status: NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel”; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system updated to [48268].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding ~99.85 units of water at 15°C; status: WORKING; connection point (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_system updated to [48268].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup at position(-6.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=48268; status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=48269; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 21.5) with fluid_system=48270; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-3.5, 23.5) with fluid_system=48275; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=48274; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(3.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=48279; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(2.5, 24.5) with fluid_system=48278; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system=48281; status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Repeated Pipeline Connection Failures Due to Incorrect Fluid System Identifiers:
  • Multiple connection attempts using fluid_system values 47924, 47967, 48010, 48053, 48096, 48139, 48182, and 48225 have all aborted.
  • Tip: Dynamically retrieve and validate the active boiler output fluid_system value from the current pipeline network configuration before attempting connection.
  
- Hardcoded Fluid System Assumptions:
  • Reliance on preset fluid_system identifiers has led to continual aborted pipeline connection attempts.
  • Tip: Derive the active fluid system identifier at runtime to ensure correct connection parameters.
  
- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler remains unfueled, impeding effective steam generation.
  • Tip: Continuously monitor and replenish the boiler’s fuel supply to maintain operation.
